data.name: ToledoVR Demo
data.detailed_description:
ToledoVR is a fun action/strategy game for the HTC Vive.

This demo is limited to the level 1 abilities of the God Player and the level 2 abilities of the VR Player

There a singleplayer option in this game but it is meant to be played in local multiplayer.

Become a God and destroy the enemies towers and minions. The game combines moba like gameplay with God-game strategy elements and great action.

Features VR:

  • Attack from the top (hitting the player, meteors)
  • Attack with the bow (exploding arrow, ice arrow)
  • Attack with melee weapons (sword,spear, hammer)
  • Use special abilities (slow-motion, lightning storm, force pulse)

Features PC:

  • Third Person view
  • Fly around, attack the VR Player
  • Use different abilities: Special attacks, smash, bomb, heal
  • Summon clouds to blind the VR Player

data.short_description: Become a God and destroy the enemies towers and minions. Fight your friend playing on the PC using various weapons such as meteors, bow, melee weapons and  slow motion. On the PC control your Player from third-person, fly around and use different abilities to attack the God.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 ti / AMD 5850
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:

  • Processor: Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD RX 480 / GTX 1060
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
